guest-home.contract.title: Contract
guest-home.contract.message:
Hello,
By clicking below you will have access to the contracts and documents to view and sign.
You can sign by dragging your finger on the screen and once confirmed, collect a copy from your e-mail address.
Have a nice stay.
guest-home.ssci.title: Your online check-in
guest-home.ssci.message:
Italian law requires all accommodation facilities to collect some guest data.
Through this platform you can register your data, upload photos of your and other guests' documents, as well as a selfie of each guest.
These data are kept with the utmost security and deleted from any database within 30 days of your arrival at the facility.
We are waiting for you

empty-center.property-menu.createhomeboo: Surprise your guests with the personalized homebook.

Here few tips to personalize your HomeBook:

  • Use the menu on the left to edit and update all sessions
  • On the right, you can preview your HomeBook while progressing
  • Completing the HomeBook may require you some time. You can take a break anytime you wish. All your work will be always saved

page-guest-list-autocheckin.gdpr.descrip: Italian law requires all accommodation facilities to collect some guest data. Through this platform you can register data, attach photos of documents, and check your and your companions' Health Pass. This data will be deleted from each database the day after your arrival at the facility.
